title: Love Homes

title: Garage Doors Lanarkshire

title: CMR Repair Centre
shortdesc: CMR covers both North and South Lanarkshire!
postbody: CMR's Colin offers over 30 years of experience in domestic appliance repair, delivering a friendly and professional service at an affordable price. Colin's knowledge means that customers receive only the best advice about their appliance, so call today for a free repair quote on 07977 800895.

title: Bramble Bay Blinds
postbody: Supply and install Interior Blinds, Fabric and Aluminium Awnings and Repair Work.

title: Mates Rates Rubber And Recreation
postbody:
Returning to the Pine Rivers area after an enforced 2 ½ year absence, the re-branded ‘Mates Rates’ intends to provide a range of products for domestic and commercial use The range of the top quality products selected are all from Australian Suppliers at Unbelievable prices, at or below on-line prices at a local location, so you can see, feel and touch before purchase.

This is made possible by reducing overhead and operating costs to a minimum and passing on the savings to the customer in the form of lower prices. Product ranges include popular rubber mats and matting for domestic and commercial use such as cut to length rubber seal profiles, waterproof closed cell foam strip seals of various widths & thicknesses from which to choose.

title: The Landscaping Yard
address: 151 Dohles Rocks Rd Kallangur QLD 4503 Australia
postbody: The Landscaping Yard and Hardware has been servicing customers in Kallangur and all areas from the Sunshine Coast to the Gold Coast since December 1994.
